short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bagel AI provides real-time product suggestions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bagel AI Feature Requests Submission and Tracking
Create a Feature Request on behalf of your customers from anywhere with the Bagel AI Chrome Extension.

ASSURE QUICK AND EFFECTIVE PROCESSING BY THE PRODUCT TEAM
Bagel AI matches your request to existing Product Backlog items to avoid duplications as well as identifies the right product owner for effective dispatching.

ENSURE PRODUCT ROADMAP IS GEARED TOWARDS REVENUE & IMPACT
Bagel AI is tying KPIs such as revenue and retention to each product request and provides the business context so go-to-market teams can strategically influence the roadmap.

KEEP YOUR CUSTOMERS ALWAYS IN THE KNOW
Your requests are automatically updated so you can communicate the status and details of the planned product solution to your customers at any time.
